thread.title: Nigel Farage dines with Donald Trump after PM snubs Brexiteer's ‘special relationship’
thread.title_full: Nigel Farage dines with Donald Trump after PM snubs Brexiteer's ‘special relationship’

title: Nigel Farage dines with Donald Trump after PM snubs Brexiteer's ‘special relationship’
text:
Nigel Farage dines with Donald Trump after PM snubs Brexiteer's ‘special relationship’ Nigel Farage dines with Donald Trump after PM snubs Brexiteer's ‘special relationship’ NIGEL Farage has met with President Trump yet again despite Theresa May’s attempts to undermine the relationship between the political firebrands. PUBLISHED: 03:44, Sun, Feb 26, 2017 | UPDATED: 03:58, Sun, Feb 26, 2017 TWITTER The eurosceptic met with the leader of the free world in his Washington hotel 
The former Ukip leader, who campaigned tirelessly to leave the EU for over 20 years, has developed an affinity with the Republican President after both their outsider campaigns defied the odds and slapped down the mainstream campaigns. 
Now the eurosceptic MEP has met with Mr Trump again over dinner in the President’s International Hotel in Washington. Related articles
